contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
I am trying to create database using below dbmanager command, its creating the blank database. Anyone please confirm me this is expect behavour ? i am using sample website "Kentico.Xperience.DancingGoat" \ dotnet kentico-xperience-dbmanager --
-s "(LocalDb)\MSSQLLocalDB" \\
-d "XBK13" \\
-u "\*\*\*" \\
-p "\*\*\*\*\*" \\
-a "administrator" \\
--hash-string-salt "dd64b25a-f099-4187-96e0-4f2d78343e1b" \\
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.5.1]
* .NET version: \[8|9]
* Execution environment: \[SaaS|Private cloud (Azure/AWS/Virtual machine)]
* Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com)
